.. index:: FieldOfPrimeCharacteristic

.. _l4669656c644f665072696d654368617261637465726973746963:

FieldOfPrimeCharacteristic
==========================

:viewcode:`ffcat.spad line 1 <ffcat.spad#L1>` :editcode:`[edit on github] <ffcat.spad#L1>`


FieldOfPrimeCharacteristic is the category of fields of prime characteristic, e.g. finite fields, algebraic closures of fields of prime characteristic, transcendental extensions of of fields of prime characteristic.


.. _l4669656c644f665072696d654368617261637465726973746963-30:

\ :ref:`0 <l4162656c69616e4d6f6e6f6964-30>`\ \: % 
  from \ :ref:`AbelianMonoid <l4162656c69616e4d6f6e6f6964>`\

.. index::
   pair: FieldOfPrimeCharacteristic; discreteLog

:spadfun:`discreteLog`\: (%, %) -> Union(\ :ref:`NonNegativeInteger <l4e6f6e4e65676174697665496e7465676572>`\ , failed) 
  \ ``discreteLog(b, a)``\  computes \ ``s``\  with \ ``b^s = a``\  if such an \ ``s``\  exists.

.. _l4669656c644f665072696d654368617261637465726973746963-6f72646572:

.. index::
   pair: FieldOfPrimeCharacteristic; order

:spadfun:`order`\: % -> \ :ref:`OnePointCompletion <l4f6e65506f696e74436f6d706c6574696f6e>`\  \ :ref:`PositiveInteger <l506f736974697665496e7465676572>`\  
  \ ``order(a)``\  computes the order of an element in the multiplicative group of the field. Error: if \ ``a``\  is 0.

.. _l4669656c644f665072696d654368617261637465726973746963-7072696d6546726f62656e697573:

.. index::
   pair: FieldOfPrimeCharacteristic; primeFrobenius

:spadfun:`primeFrobenius`\: % -> % 
  \ ``primeFrobenius(a)``\  returns \ ``a ^ p``\  where \ ``p``\  is the characteristic.


.. index::
   pair: FieldOfPrimeCharacteristic; primeFrobenius

:spadfun:`primeFrobenius`\: (%, \ :ref:`NonNegativeInteger <l4e6f6e4e65676174697665496e7465676572>`\ ) -> % 
  \ ``primeFrobenius(a, s)``\  returns \ ``a^(p^s)``\  where \ ``p``\  is the characteristic.
